description: The Sekishoku Ouki (赤色王旗 = Red Royal Flag) is a group of http://anidb.net/ch26296 [Hanaukyou Hokusai]`s personal bodygoards, with http://anidb.net/ch26347 [Shikouin] as their commander. They consist of 12 selected "knights" and have a power available that even Hanaukyou`s Defense Department can`t match.
name: Sekishoku Ouki
